divs: sighting detailsme and my son came home early from the 4th of july in n. andover, ma. because my youngest son was 1 1\2, and other 6. we were watching the fire works out side the window. and a lite went up and stop and i said to my son do you see that and it kept coming closer to our apt, when it go close i open the screen and it was a large grey ship. and it was making a large humming noise. i ran to the back porch and it was over the house with that noise , in which i will never forget. and i went back inside grab my baby and called my mother & son huddle and called her back. she said if you saw someone did., but no one was around. and to this day the older remembers and will never forget. he id 32. and i saw again in that area early.] \\\
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lawrence
There were no other sightings in Lawrence on or around July 14th 1981
Summary: Humming and grey with lights all around it
